meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shaggy.
meanings.sent1: The dog's shagginess made it look fluffy and cute.
meanings.sent2: Her hair's shagginess gave her a carefree look.
meanings.sent3: The shagginess of the mop made it seem like a playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: The shagginess of the forest added a wild charm to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The shagginess of the rug made it feel like walking on clouds.

meanings.definition: The appearance of being unkempt or untidy.
meanings.sent1: The shagginess of his clothes suggested he had just woken up.
meanings.sent2: The shagginess of the room indicated it hadn't been cleaned in a while.
meanings.sent3: The shagginess of the garden made it look like a jungle adventure.
meanings.sent4: The shagginess of the old book gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The shagginess of the yarn made knitting a cozy sweater a delight.
